## CAOMS - DISC 1st Joint Conference

I will be delivering the Keynote Address at the Cambodian Association of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons (CAOMS) & Dental Implant Society of Cambodia (DISC) 1st Joint Conference in Phnom Penh, Cambodia from June 13th to 14th 2024. The topic of my presentation will be “The Detection of Human Papillomavirus in Oral Squamous Cell Carcinoma.”

After the conference has concluded, I will update this page to make the slidedeck from my presentation available to view and download.
